title: Hhampuz
author: Hhampuz
created_time: May 14, 2022, 02:58:40 AMLast edit: May 21, 2022, 10:50:18 PM by Hhampuz
content: Fairspin.io have been around for a while now while building up their reputation as a trusted site for all of your gambling needs! With the recent release of their own token they are looking into further avenues to spread the word and if you are a quality gambling board poster we want to hire YOU in this campaign.Rules and Requirements:Wear the Signature and Avatar.Make a minimum of 20 constructive posts each week that you participate in order to receive a payment.Make a minimum of 10 constructive posts in the Gambling section each week in order to receive a payment. These 10 will count towards the 20 post weekly requirement.Posts in Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, Any and all bounty/campaign threads and places where your Signature is not displayed will not count towards the weekly requirement.Local posts are allowed but only a maximum of 5 per week.Do not have legitimate negative feedback from a DT member if you want to take part in this campaign.If you receive legitimate negative feedback from a DT member during your stay you may be removed without payment or notice.Do not enroll your main and alt account in this campaign, if you do they'll both be removed and you'll be blacklisted from all of my campaigns.Do not wear any other Signature or Avatar during your stay in this campaign, if you do you'll be removed without payment or notice.You need to have received a minimum of 5 merit in the last 120 days in order to join this campaign.Each payment will be sent directly to your bech32 BTC address each Sunday (Weeks will run from Sundays > Saturdays CET timezone)This Campaign is open for Full Members, Sr. Members and Hero/Legendary Members.Fairspin.io reserves the right to cancel or alter the campaign at any time and for any reason. Each started week will be paid out in full!Payouts and Positions:5x Full Members - $40 in BTC/Week.6x Sr. Members - $60 in BTC/Week.8x Hero/Legendary Members - $80 in BTC/Week.The Signatures:Full
